title: NIT Andhra Pradesh (NIT AP): Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking
meta_description: NIT Andhra Pradesh is located in Tadepalligudem, West Godavari District, Andhra Pradesh. NIT Andhra Pradesh is known for its PhD and BTech Program. NIT Andhra Pradesh campus spans 172.6 acres.
keywords: Nit andhra pradesh cutoff, Nit andhra pradesh ranking, nit andhra pradesh placement, nit andhra pradesh college pravesh, nit andhra pradesh location, nit andhra pradesh highest package, Nit andhra pradesh fee structure, nit andhra pradesh average package

basic_info.name: NIT Andhra Pradesh Course & Fees
description: NIT Andhra Pradesh offers BTech, MTech, and PhD courses. Admission to these courses is based on national-level exams. The JEE Mains exam is used to determine rankings for Indian students applying to bachelor of technology (B.Tech.) programs. Foreign students can enroll in the B.Tech. program through the DASA and SII programs.

JEE Mains is considered for admission to the BTech courses and GATE scores are considered for admission to MTech programs. To get admitted to Ph.D. programs, candidates are required to qualify for a written exam and appear for an interview. NIT Andhra Pradesh introduced the Ph.D. program on both a full-time and part-time basis in all of the institute's currently operating departments and Schools. MS by research was implemented by NIT Andhra Pradesh in all engineering disciplines using an externally financed model.
For more information do check NIT Andhra Pradesh Courses

basic_info.name: NIT Andhra Pradesh Course Admissions
description: NIT Andhra Pradesh B.Tech aspirants must have completed their 10+2 requirements in the fields of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English with JEE Mains. After the JoSAA counseling procedure has been completed, seats are allocated based on previous academic performance.

NIT Andhra Pradesh Placements
description: National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh popularly known as NIT Andhra Pradesh has concluded its 2023 placements. As per the placement statistics released on June 23, 2023, NIT Andra Pradesh placement 2023 recorded a total of 83.5% placement. NIT Andra Pradesh's highest package stood at INR 44 LPA and NIT Andra Pradesh's average package stood at INR 8.13 LPA.

basic_info.name: NIT Andhra Pradesh Highest Package
description: During the placement drive of 2023, the highest package stood at INR 44 LPA, and the average package at INR 8.13 LPA.

basic_info.name: NIT Andhra Pradesh Campus Life and Events
description: NIT Andhra Pradesh is currently operating from its permanent location. The campus is very well connected by road Rajamahendravaram - Eluru (NH 216A), by rail Howrah-Chennai main line, and by air Rajahmundry Airport is 50 km distant, respectively. The 176-acre campus is situated in Tadepalligudem, a town in Andhra Pradesh's West Godavari district.

A total of 2,000 students can be housed in the five ladies' and seven boys' dorms of NIT Andhra. First-year students have a four-person room, second and third-year students have a two-person room, and fourth-year students have a single-person room. The hostels feature a common area, Wi-Fi, and sporting equipment. To provide meals and other eatables, there is one mess for the girls' hostel and two messes for the boys' hostels.

basic_info.name: NIT Andhra Pradesh NIRF Ranking
description: NIT Andhra Pradesh B.Tech ranking by NIRF is 251 out of 300 colleges in India in 2022.
Also check NIT Andhra Pradesh Ranking

faqs.question: Does NIT AP have any refund policy?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, NIT AP refunds INR 6000 from the admission fees paid to the student who wishes to cancel their admission at the institute before the academic session starts.

faqs.question: Does NIT AP waive off any tuition fee for General and OBC category students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, NIT AP remmits 100% of the Tuition Fee for General and OBC students whose family income is less than Rs.1 lakh per annum.

faqs.question: What sort of placement packages are offered at NIT-AP?
faqs.answer: Ans.During the 2023 placement drive, the average placement package stood at INR 8.13 LPA while the highest package stood at INR 44 LPA.

faqs.question: Does the institute offer placements to the M.Tech. and M.Sc. students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the institute does offer placements to its M.Tech. and M.Sc. students.

faqs.question: What is the JEE Main Cutoff rank for B.Tech CSE program at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The JEE Main Cutoff rank for the B.Tech CSE program is 5223 at NIT Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: .Ques.What is the campus size of NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The NIT Andhra Pradesh campus occupies 172 acres of land close to the Chennai-Kolkata Highway.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the facilities provided at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.The facilities provided at NIT Andhra Pradesh are Hostels, Medical, Central Library, Transportation, NSS Unit, Sports, and many more.

faqs.question: Ques.. Is NIT Andhra Pradesh worth joining?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, NIT Andhra Pradesh offers aesthetically beautiful, environmentally responsible campus amenities that improve the learning, teaching, and working environment for Institute stakeholders as well as a welcoming and pleasurable visit for visitors.

faqs.question: Ques.. Does NIT Andhra Pradesh have a refund policy?
faqs.answer: Ans.If a candidates cancels his/her admission only partial amount will be refunded.The Institute fee paid by the candidate will be returned after a deduction of approximately INR 29,500 if the seat is cancelled within 02 months of the admissions deadline or if the candidate fails to report to the Institute after paying the Institute fee.The security deposit, which is limited to INR 6,000, may only be recovered if the ticket is cancelled after 02 months from the admissions deadline.

faqs.question: Ques.. How old is NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.With NIT Warangal serving as its mentor institute, the National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh was founded by the Ministry of Education as the 31st NIT following the division of the united Andhra Pradesh. It began operations on August 20, 2015, at the Sri Vasavi Engineering College Campus in Tadepalligudem.

faqs.question: Ques.. Is NIT Andhra Pradesh recognized?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, NIT Andhra Pradesh is approved and recognized by AICTE.

faqs.question: Ques.. Where is NIT Andhra Pradesh located?
faqs.answer: Ans.The main campus of NIT Andhra Pradesh are in Tadepalligudem, India.

faqs.question: Ques.. What is the dress code at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.Only workout skirts, shorts, or fitness pants without hardware are acceptable; no khakis, trousers, belts, or buckles are allowed. Only breathable, non-revealing exercise tops or tees are allowed; no dress shirts, ties, dress jackets, or blazers.

faqs.question: Ques.. What is the charge of hostel accommodation at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.NIT Andhra Pradesh charges INR 38,000 hostel fees for both male and female.

faqs.question: Ques.. Does NIT Andhra Pradesh waive off course fees for students?
faqs.answer: Ans.. According to government regulations, UNRESERVED/OBC students are qualified for fee waivers if their family's income falls within the ranges listed below.I) Students who come from families with an annual income below one lakh rupees (the maximum allowed is Rs. 99,999/-).ii) Other economically disadvantaged pupils (with a household annual income of between 1 lakh and 5 lakh rupees (the maximum permissible amount)).iii) SC/ST students are not eligible for fee waivers.

faqs.question: How are the placements at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.NIT Andra Pradesh placements 2023 concluded with 83.5% placement. NIT Andra Pradesh highest package stood at INR 44 LPA and the NIT Andra Pradesh average package stood at INR 8.13 LPA.

faqs.question: What courses are offered at NIT Puducherry?
faqs.answer: Ans.. NIT Andhra Pradesh provides admission to students in B.Tech, M.Tech, M.Sc, ans PhD, programs based on different selection criteria.

faqs.question: Ques.. How is the campus life at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.NIT Andhra Pradesh, located in Tadepalligudem, is known for its vibrant campus life. Here are some aspects of campus life at NIT Andhra Pradesh:Academic Life: The academic curriculum at NIT Andhra Pradesh is rigorous and challenging. The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, science, and humanities. Students are encouraged to take part in research projects, technical clubs, and competitions to enhance their academic skills.Cultural Activities: NIT Andhra Pradesh has a diverse student community with students from different parts of the country. The institute encourages students to participate in cultural activities to promote cultural exchange and harmony.Sports and Recreation: The institute has excellent sports facilities, including a cricket ground, a football field, a basketball court, a volleyball court, and an indoor sports complex.Student Clubs and Societies: NIT Andhra Pradesh has a wide range of student clubs and societies, such as robotics club, coding club, photography club, and literary society.

faqs.question: Is there any annual summit at NIT Andhra?
faqs.answer: Ans.. NIT Andhra Pradesh conducts an annual technical fest called "Technozion" which aims to provide a platform for students to showcase their technical skills and creativity. Technozion features a variety of events and competitions related to various fields such as robotics, coding, electronics, and more. In addition to Technozion, NIT Andhra Pradesh also conducts an annual entrepreneurship summit called "E-Summit" which focuses on promoting entrepreneurship and innovation among students. The summit includes talks and workshops by successful entrepreneurs and business leaders, startup pitch competitions, networking opportunities, and more.

faqs.question: Ques.. Which is the best branch at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Ans.B.Tech in ECE is the best choice as it is emerging as one of the top engineering branch at NIT Andhra

faqs.question: Ques.. Does NIT Andhra Pradesh have a permanent campus?
faqs.answer: Ans.The academic and laboratory complexes, hostels, faculty and staff housing, and other Phase IA buildings have already undergone construction. The institute is currently operating exclusively from its permanent location.

Section.name: About NIT Andhra Pradesh
Section.description:
The National Institute of Technology is a public technical institution. NIT Andhra Pradesh is located in Tadepalligudem, West Godavari District, Andhra Pradesh. NIT Andhra Pradesh is ranked 251 in the engineering category by NIRF 2022. NIT Andhra Pradesh is known for its PhD and BTech Program. NIT Andhra Pradesh campus spans 172.6 acres. There are 37 courses offered by the institute's 10 departments. NIT Andhra Pradesh's most well-known program is BTech CSE. Admission to the BTech course is granted on the basis of JEE Main rank. JoSAA announces the Btech JEE Main cutoff. The duration of the course is 4 years and the total fee is approximately INR 5.45 Lakh approximately. Check: NIT Andhra Pradesh Admission
NIT Andra Pradesh placements 2023 concluded with 83.5% placement. NIT Andra Pradesh's highest package stood at INR 44 LPA and NIT Andra Pradesh's average package stood at INR 8.13 LPA. NBCC, Microchip, DLF, IIT Roorkee, DRDL, BHEL, CSIR, and IBM are some of the main employers at NIT Andhra Pradesh. For more information check NIT Andhra Pradesh Course and Fees.
Table of Content
Also Check NIT Andhra Pradesh News
NIT Andhra Pradesh offers BTech, MTech, and PhD courses. Admission to these courses is based on national-level exams. The JEE Mains exam is used to determine rankings for Indian students applying to bachelor of technology (B.Tech.) programs. Foreign students can enroll in the B.Tech. program through the DASA and SII programs.
JEE Mains is considered for admission to the BTech courses and GATE scores are considered for admission to MTech programs. To get admitted to Ph.D. programs, candidates are required to qualify for a written exam and appear for an interview. NIT Andhra Pradesh introduced the Ph.D. program on both a full-time and part-time basis in all of the institute's currently operating departments and Schools. MS by research was implemented by NIT Andhra Pradesh in all engineering disciplines using an externally financed model.

National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh popularly known as NIT Andhra Pradesh has concluded its 2023 placements. As per the placement statistics released on June 23, 2023, NIT Andra Pradesh placement 2023 recorded a total of 83.5% placement. NIT Andra Pradesh's highest package stood at INR 44 LPA and NIT Andra Pradesh's average package stood at INR 8.13 LPA.

During the placement drive of 2023, the highest package stood at INR 44 LPA, and the average package at INR 8.13 LPA.
NIT Andhra Pradesh Placements 2022-23 are in-process currently. For more check out the NIT Andhra Pradesh placements 2022 in detail in the video given below:

NIT Andhra Pradesh is currently operating from its permanent location. The campus is very well connected by road Rajamahendravaram - Eluru (NH 216A), by rail Howrah-Chennai main line, and by air Rajahmundry Airport is 50 km distant, respectively. The 176-acre campus is situated in Tadepalligudem, a town in Andhra Pradesh's West Godavari district.
A total of 2,000 students can be housed in the five ladies' and seven boys' dorms of NIT Andhra. First-year students have a four-person room, second and third-year students have a two-person room, and fourth-year students have a single-person room. The hostels feature a common area, Wi-Fi, and sporting equipment. To provide meals and other eatables, there is one mess for the girls' hostel and two messes for the boys' hostels.

Ques.. How is the campus life at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
Ans. NIT Andhra Pradesh, located in Tadepalligudem, is known for its vibrant campus life. Here are some aspects of campus life at NIT Andhra Pradesh:
Academic Life: The academic curriculum at NIT Andhra Pradesh is rigorous and challenging. The institute offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, science, and humanities. Students are encouraged to take part in research projects, technical clubs, and competitions to enhance their academic skills.
Cultural Activities: NIT Andhra Pradesh has a diverse student community with students from different parts of the country. The institute encourages students to participate in cultural activities to promote cultural exchange and harmony.
Sports and Recreation: The institute has excellent sports facilities, including a cricket ground, a football field, a basketball court, a volleyball court, and an indoor sports complex.
Student Clubs and Societies: NIT Andhra Pradesh has a wide range of student clubs and societies, such as robotics club, coding club, photography club, and literary society.
Ques. Is there any annual summit at NIT Andhra?
Ans.. NIT Andhra Pradesh conducts an annual technical fest called "Technozion" which aims to provide a platform for students to showcase their technical skills and creativity. Technozion features a variety of events and competitions related to various fields such as robotics, coding, electronics, and more. In addition to Technozion, NIT Andhra Pradesh also conducts an annual entrepreneurship summit called "E-Summit" which focuses on promoting entrepreneurship and innovation among students. The summit includes talks and workshops by successful entrepreneurs and business leaders, startup pitch competitions, networking opportunities, and more.
Ques.. Which is the best branch at NIT Andhra Pradesh?
Ans. B.Tech in ECE is the best choice as it is emerging as one of the top engineering branch at NIT Andhra
Ques.. Does NIT Andhra Pradesh have a permanent campus?
Ans.The academic and laboratory complexes, hostels, faculty and staff housing, and other Phase IA buildings have already undergone construction. The institute is currently operating exclusively from its permanent location.
